description: Dawn breaks. You leave the parking lot, skis strapped to your bag and begin your ascent. It's cold, but with grades this steep, temperatures will only rise. Designed to deliver performance and versatility, the new Blackcomb Eco long sleeve turtle neck with half zip lets you control your micro climate, letting in air when you need it, trapping in warmth when it's time to descend and the day is done. All the functionality and performance you demand with seamless construction and freedom of movement to take you there.
name: Odlo BL Top Turtle Neck LS Half Zip Blackcomb Eco - Mens
